issue.title: [Rust] Generate random arrays and batches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12120](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12120). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I need a random data generator for the Parquet <> Arrow integration. It takes me a while to craft a test case, so being able to create random data would make it a bit easier to improve test coverage and catch edge-cases in the code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12120?focusedCommentId=17311569) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9824
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9824>
